title: If someone wishes Happy valentine what to reply back
transcript: okay Mariam from Gambia says that her uh neighbor who is a Christian and he uh wishes her happy valentine and she answers back by saying happy valentine to you um Mariam this is inappropriate and he's a stranger to you he is a man he's an UNAM and he wishes you a a valentine maybe exchanging gifts as well and and and cards and maybe go for dinner this is totally prohibited what is this even if he tells you a happy valentine ignore him even don't reply to him don't look at him he's an and you're not allowed to do this
